title: Night Visitor
description: "Night Visitor" is a suspenseful, sometimes sexy novel about a man, Robert Kass, who, while making a living running his small B&B lodging in southwestern New Mexixco, suddenly his life is changed by unknown forces and beings. He, along with his guests and friends begin to witness and experience things and objects, that appear to be Extraterrestrial in origin effecting his personal and public life.
author: Roger McKasson
